dia.str: I'm a novice. I'm looking for work.
Good, good! I have to make this work! I have to bring this golem to life! You need to help me. What do I need?

Yes! Yes! That is the question! What do I need? How can one resurrect an old golem? I have no time to read all the books around here! You do it! Read the books in the library and find out how to resurrect golems! Here take this rune it will allow you to use the teleporter to the library.
